summary: TutorNow is a tutoring platform which connects students with the best tutors by proximity. It streamlines the process of acquiring students through an automated messaging system.

Web form system built for the Pakistani Consulate. Applicants can fill and submit forms which are administrated by different tiers of administration. Includes support for file upload & mobile responsive.
As part of our university capstone project, we built a virtual reality simulation of the solar system. This was built using Unreal Engine and supports all standard VR systems such as the Oculus.

HeyFam helps you find the best places to meet up with friends using a distance matrix algorithm based on transport routes. Users can join a session and enter their own locations. The system will then find the most optimal location for the party to meet.
Developed a prototype version of campus maps for the university to significantly improve student experience. It's aim is to be completely web responsive and to provide more relevant data to students.
